title: Eva Longoria: Searching for Mexico
overview: Mexico is one of the most magical places on earth, where ancient meets modern to create something unique. Award-winning actress, producer, director, and activist Eva Longoria is proud of her Mexican roots and deeply connected to the country she calls her second home. Across six immersive episodes, Longoria explores the lands of her ancestors to see how Mexico's rich culture, landscape, and history have helped shape its cuisine, loved the world over. Executive produced by Stanley Tucci, Eva Longoria: Searching for Mexico invites audiences to journey across the many vibrant regions of Mexico, revealing its unique and colorful cuisines.
